```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
```

```{r setup}
library(openalexR)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r bib-works}
bib_works <- oa_fetch(
  entity = "works",
  title.search = c("bibliometric analysis", "science mapping"),
  cited_by_count = ">500", 
  count_only = FALSE
) 

institution_names <- lapply(
  my_works$author, 
  function(x) unique(x$institution_display_name)
)
head(institution_names)
```


```{r italian-institutions}
large_italian_insts <- oa_fetch(
  entity = "institutions",
  country_code = "it",
  cited_by_count = ">2000000",
  type = "education",
  verbose = TRUE
)

lat_longs <- lapply(
  large_italian_insts$geo, 
  function(x) c(x$latitude, x$longitude)
)

head(lat_longs)
```
